Uses of Interface
org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing.TriggerBuilder

  • Packages that use TriggerBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing
    Defines the Window transform for dividing the elements in a PCollection into windows, and the Trigger for controlling when those elements are output.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.util
    Defines utilities used by the Dataflow SDK.

    • Uses of TriggerBuilder in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing

      Subinterfaces of TriggerBuilder in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AfterWatermark.AfterWatermarkEarly
      Interface for building an AfterWatermarkTrigger with early firings already filled in.
      static interface  AfterWatermark.AfterWatermarkLate
      Interface for building an AfterWatermarkTrigger with late firings already filled in.
      Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing that implement TriggerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AfterAll
      Create a Trigger that fires and finishes once after all of its sub-triggers have fired.
      class  AfterDelayFromFirstElement
      A base class for triggers that happen after a processing time delay from the arrival of the first element in a pane.
      class  AfterEach
      A composite Trigger that executes its sub-triggers in order.
      class  AfterFirst
      Create a composite Trigger that fires once after at least one of its sub-triggers have fired.
      class  AfterPane
      Triggers that fire based on properties of the elements in the current pane.
      class  AfterProcessingTime
      AfterProcessingTime triggers fire based on the current processing time.
      static class  AfterWatermark.FromEndOfWindow
      A watermark trigger targeted relative to the end of the window.
      class  DefaultTrigger
      A trigger that is equivalent to Repeatedly.forever(AfterWatermark.pastEndOfWindow()).
      class  Repeatedly
      Repeat a trigger, either until some condition is met or forever.
      class  Trigger
      Triggers control when the elements for a specific key and window are output.
      static class  Trigger.OnceTrigger
      Triggers that are guaranteed to fire at most once should extend from this, rather than the general Trigger class to indicate that behavior.
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing that return TriggerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TriggerBuilder AfterWatermark.AfterWatermarkLate.withEarlyFirings(Trigger.OnceTrigger earlyTrigger)
      Creates a new Trigger like the this, except that it fires repeatedly whenever the given Trigger fires before the watermark has passed the end of the window.
      TriggerBuilder AfterWatermark.AfterWatermarkEarly.withLateFirings(Trigger.OnceTrigger lateTrigger)
      Creates a new Trigger like the this, except that it fires repeatedly whenever the given Trigger fires after the watermark has passed the end of the window.
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing with parameters of type TriggerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Window.Bound<T> Window.Bound.triggering(TriggerBuilder trigger)
      Sets a non-default trigger for this Window PTransform.
      static <T> Window.Bound<T> Window.triggering(TriggerBuilder trigger)
      Sets a non-default trigger for this Window PTransform.
      <T> Window.Bound<T> Window.Unbound.triggering(TriggerBuilder trigger)
      Sets a non-default trigger for this Window PTransform.

    • Uses of TriggerBuilder in org.apache.beam.sdk.util

      Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.util that implement TriggerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReshuffleTrigger<W extends BoundedWindow>
      The trigger used with Reshuffle which triggers on every element and never buffers state.
